plot: When a time travel Manager has to select his first civilian case to bring back in time, he has to reevaluate the merits of spending time in the past.
title: The Manager
plot_es: When a time travel Manager has to select his first civilian case to bring back in time, he has to reevaluate the merits of spending time in the past.
plot_en: When a time travel Manager has to select his first civilian case to bring back in time, he has to reevaluate the merits of spending time in the past.
